jd: From: sunil, ICS sunil@icsglobalsoft.com Reply to: sunil@icsglobalsoft.com Role: Python Architect Location: San Deigo, CA (Onsite)Duration: long TermMandatory Skills: Ability to develop Enterprise and Project Performance Test strategies Strong Python/ Locust tool skills Proven ability to develop frameworks preferably performance testing frameworks Collaborate with Development, Product owners, solution architects, business teams Good understanding of Performance Testing and Engineering lifecycle, including scoping and workload modeling Conduct performance tests – Load, Stress, Endurance etc Ability to analyze test results and provide performance improvement recommendations Demonstrated experience with APM, preferably Datadog Working knowledge of distributed Cache, Load Balancers, Database systems Good project planning skills Be able to identify improvement areas and implement for delivery excellence  Strong problem-solving skills Strong written and verbal communication skills Interest in learning new tools and technologiesGood to have skills Design and implement automated Performance Testing in the CI/CD pipeline. Experienced in setting up Production monitoring dashboards based on business and IT goals Experience with micros servers based on architecture and containerization-based deployments like Docker, Kubernetes Knowledge of application architecture concepts, including topology, protocols, components, and principles would be advantageous Chaos Engineering
